insurer.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a person or company that provides insurance
insurer.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: If an insurer failed, the industry organization would pay 90% of all claims.
insurer.translation[1].definitions[1].de: used in a particular insurance contract or legal case to refer to the company providing insurance. You can refer to ‘the insurers’ even if there is only one company
insurer.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: When he tried to recover his loss, the insurers denied liability.
